description: View of all mdm orgs and some metadata about the orgs

schema.name: org_name
schema.description: The name of the org to compliment the org id so we can tell who it is without having to look it up.

schema.name: org_type
schema.description: Type of the org (internal, customer, etc.).

schema.name: num_devices
schema.description: The number of android devices the org has enrolled into the MDM.

schema.name: cell
schema.description: The cell (i.e us{2-10}) the org is part of.

schema.name: dashboard_link
schema.description: The Samsara dashboard link to the orgs MDM overview.
